## NodeImageData.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `NodeImageData` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(
    width: number, 
    height: number, data?: Uint8ClampedArray);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  width | <code>number</code> | The width of the image data in pixels. |
|  height | <code>number</code> | The height of the image data in pixels. |
|  data | <code>Uint8ClampedArray</code> | Optional initial RGB32 image data. |
